cards.rules_text:
Flying
Whenever you exile one or more cards you own from anywhere, put a +1/+1 counter on Starbound Philosopher. This ability triggers only once each turn.

Flying
{W}{B}, Sacrifice Overseer of Balance: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
Whenever another Angel enters under your control, you may pay 2 life. If you do, return Overseer of Balance from your graveyard to your hand.

When Muse of the Gods enters, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an Aura from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Whenever another enchantment enters under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Whenever one or more creature cards leave your graveyard, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, choose one —
• Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
• Stormbringer Giant deals 1 damage to each opponent.

Menace
Minotaur spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

Deathtouch
Whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield during your turn, create a 1/1 black Insect creature token. This ability triggers only once each turn.

Create a tapped land token named Wastes with “{T}: Add {C}.” Then if your horizon is 4 or greater, create a 5/5 green Wurm creature token. [i](Your horizon is equal to the number of differently named lands you control.)[/i]

When Explore the Omenpaths enters, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
At the beginning of your end step, surveil X, where X is half of your horizon, rounded up. Then if your horizon is 4 or greater, draw a card. [i](To surveil X, look at the top X cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order. Your horizon is equal to the number of differently named lands you control.)[/i]

Whenever Fatereader enters or attacks, you may exile the top card of your library.
If you would draw a card, you may instead put a card exiled with Fatereader into its owner's hand.
Nyxborn Hoplite has first strike as long as another enchantment entered the battlefield this turn.
{2}{W}: Tap target creature. Activate only once each turn, and only if Istfell Guardian attacked this turn.

Whenever you exile one or more cards you own from anywhere, you gain 1 life.

When Nyx Prophet enters, you may search your library for an Aura card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

When Vizier of Strength enters, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

III — You may exile three differently named God-Pharaoh Sagas from among permanents you own and control and cards in your graveyard. If you do, meld them into Illusion of the God-Pharaoh.
Draw two cards, then discard a card.
Exile a creature card from your graveyard, then create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie. It gains haste until end of turn.

[-7]: Repeat the following process seven times. Each opponent loses 3 life unless that player sacrifices a nonland permanent or discards a card.

cards.rules_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I — Tap up to two target creatures. Put a stun counter on each of them. [i](If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)[/i]
II — Draw up to two cards, then discard that many cards.
III — You may exile three differently named God-Pharaoh Sagas from among permanents you own and control and cards in your graveyard. If you do, meld them into Illusion of the God-Pharaoh.
